description.value: Indicates whether a colorectal tumour specimen was involved or not involved.

display.value: Large intestine, distal surgical margin not involved by tumor (finding)
Large intestine, proximal surgical margin not involved by tumor (finding)
Large intestine, distal surgical margin, involved by tumor (finding)
Large intestine, proximal surgical margin, involved by tumor (finding)
